nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils

Class PropertyHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.PropertyHelper

  • public class PropertyHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for getting / setting properties by reflection
    Author:
    luis

      PropertyHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copyProperties(java.lang.Object source, java.lang.Object dest, java.lang.String... ignored)
      Copies all possible properties from source to dest, ignoring the given properties list.

      Returns the first property on a nested path.

      • copyProperties

        public static void copyProperties(java.lang.Object source,
                  java.lang.Object dest,
                  java.lang.String... ignored)
        Copies all possible properties from source to dest, ignoring the given properties list. Exceptions are ignored

      • firstProperty

        public static java.lang.String firstProperty(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the first property on a nested path. Ex: a.b.c => a

      • get

        Returns a property value by reflection, handling nested nulls

                               Converter<T> converter)
        Converts a value to String with the given converter

      • lastProperty

        public static java.lang.String lastProperty(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the last property on a path. Ex: a.b.c => c

      • nestedPath

        public static java.lang.String nestedPath(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the nested path after the first property. Ex: a.b.c => b.c

      • pathUntilLast

        public static java.lang.String pathUntilLast(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the nested path after until the last property. Ex: a.b.c => a.b
